title: Witch's Curse
description: A Fascinating British Suspense Thriller.It came back from the dead to haunt the countryside with its bloodthirsty evil. Already three young women had met with a ghastly end in the mist-filled night.Now it had chosen Susan as its next victim. She had seen the satanic vision that always appeared before the monster struck. Susan was alone in a place where evil had lived for centuries, helpless in the terrifying grip of a corpse that would not die.....
author: Harry Ludlam
